entity.name: person
entity.query:
SELECT p.id, p.year_of_birth, p.first_name, p.last_name, p.first_name || ' ' || p.last_name AS full_name, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.created_by, p.updated_by, i1.value AS xaccount, i2.value AS orcid, CASE WHEN active.id IS NULL THEN false ELSE true END AS has_active_publications, CASE WHEN affiliated.id IS NULL THEN false ELSE true END AS has_affiliations FROM people p LEFT JOIN identifiers i1 ON p.id = i1.person_id AND i1.source_id = (SELECT id FROM sources WHERE name = 'xkonto'::text) LEFT JOIN identifiers i2 ON p.id = i2.person_id AND i2.source_id = (SELECT id FROM sources WHERE name = 'orcid'::text)
LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT ptmp.id FROM people ptmp JOIN people2publications p2p ON p2p.person_id = ptmp.id JOIN publications publ ON publ.current_version_id = p2p.publication_version_id) active ON active.id = p.id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT ptmp2.id FROM people ptmp2 JOIN people2publications p2p ON p2p.person_id = ptmp2.id JOIN publications publ ON publ.current_version_id = p2p.publication_version_id JOIN departments2people2publications d2p2p2 ON d2p2p2.people2publication_id = p2p.id JOIN departments d ON d.id = d2p2p2.department_id WHERE publ.deleted_at IS NULL AND publ.published_at IS NOT NULL AND d.is_internal = true) affiliated ON affiliated.id = p.id
WHERE p.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY p.id

entity.name: identifiers
entity.query: SELECT person_id, value AS identifier FROM identifiers ORDER BY person_id

entity.name: alternative_names
entity.query: SELECT person_id, first_name || ' ' || last_name AS alternative_names FROM alternative_names ORDER BY person_id

entity.name: departments
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT p2p.person_id AS person_id, d.id, d.name_en, d.name_sv, COALESCE(d.start_year, -1) AS start_year, COALESCE(d.end_year, -1) AS end_year FROM departments d INNER JOIN departments2people2publications d2p2p ON d.id = d2p2p.department_id INNER JOIN people2publications p2p ON d2p2p.people2publication_id = p2p.id INNER JOIN publications p ON p2p.publication_version_id = p.current_version_id WHERE p.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY p2p.person_id
